content.right:
Team of seven members who act as local OSM community in Bajrabarahi.

  1. Mr. Dhurba Prasad Bidari-Manager (Small Farmer Cooperative Pvt. Ltd.)
  2. Mr. Rabindra Bidari-Accountant (Bajrabarahi Higher Secondary School)
  3. Mr. Kabi luv Rai-Teacher (Sunaulo Secondary School)
  4. Mr. Rajen Shrestha
  5. Mr. Krishna Bhatt
  6. Mr. Fanindra Subedi-Kiwi Enterpreneur
  7. Mr. Aatma Ram Dahal-Teacher (Bajrabarahi Higher Secondary School)
